item.description: Second Test Post This is a second test post. It follows the first test post. I don't really have any new words in me. So I'll repeat the old ones. With a numbered list this time. This post is only a test. Like the space shuttle Enterprise, it is destined to pave the way but never travel it. What happens to words unread, like these. Where do they even go? Some possibilities: They live on in all of our hearts. They were never anywhere to begin with. Vegas. Goodbye. draft by Steve Randy Waldman...
item.title: Second Test Post
item.content:encoded:
Second Test Post

This is a second test post. It follows the first test post.

I don't really have any new words in me. So I'll repeat the old ones. With a numbered list this time.

This post is only a test.

Like the space shuttle Enterprise, it is destined to pave the way but never travel it.

What happens to words unread, like these. Where do they even go?

Some possibilities:

  1. They live on in all of our hearts.
  2. They were never anywhere to begin with.
  3. Vegas.

Goodbye.

draft by Steve Randy Waldman
[2023-02-13 @ 05:25 PM EST]

item.title: Test Post
item.content:encoded:
Test Post

This post is only a test.

Like the space shuttle Enterprise, it is destined to pave the way but never travel it.

What happens to words unread, like these. Where do they even go?

Some possibilities:

  • They live on in all of our hearts.
  • They were never anywhere to begin with.
  • Vegas.

Goodbye.

draft by Steve Randy Waldman
[2023-02-13 @ 04:39 PM EST]
